frontmatter.title: Persist Model
frontmatter.description: The sections gives details on the Persist Model.
frontmatter.keywords: ballerina, programming language, ballerina packages, persist, persist model, persist data model, persist entity type, persist simple type
frontmatter.intro: The Persist module defines a mechanism to express the application's data model using the Ballerina record type. Any record type that is a subtype of the `EntityType` will be an entity in the model.

pageProps.codes:
[[-474084244,"
type SimpleType ()|boolean|int|float|decimal|string|byte[]|time:Date|time:TimeOfDay|time:Utc|time:Civil;
type EntityType record {|
   SimpleType|EntityType|EntityType[]...;
|};
"],[-294034275,"
// Valid 
type Employee record {|
   int id; // SimpleType
   string fname; // SimpleType
   string lname; // SimpleType
   Department department; // EntityType
|};


// Valid 
type Department record {|
   int id;
   string name;
   byte[] logo;
   Employee[] employees; // EntityType
|};


// Invalid
type Employee record {|
   int|string id; 
   string fname;
   string lname;
   Department department; // EntityType
|};
"],[-1045143246,"
type EntityType record {|
    readonly T <fieldName>;
|}
"],[-1975341129,"
type EntityType record {|
    readonly T <fieldName1>;
    readonly T <fieldName2>;
|}
"],[2141137538,"
type Car record {|
   readonly int id;
   string name;
   User owner;
|};

type User record {|
   readonly int id;
   string name;
   Car? car;
|};
